analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS Status is 39, indicating a Defensive regime. Momentum pushed the score to 39 from 37. Root: DXY (Dollar strength) eased slightly while VIX (Volatility/Fear) dropped 7%, suggesting a minor reduction in immediate panic. Warning: However, rising HY Spreads (Credit risk) signal underlying corporate stress despite the crypto bounce. Conclusion: Maintain a defensive posture. A sustained VIX decline could trigger a transition toward Neutral, but cautious accumulation is not yet warranted until global liquidity stabilizes further.

reports.EN: GMS Status is 39, indicating a Defensive regime. Momentum pushed the score to 39 from 37. Root: DXY (Dollar strength) eased slightly while VIX (Volatility/Fear) dropped 7%, suggesting a minor reduction in immediate panic. Warning: However, rising HY Spreads (Credit risk) signal underlying corporate stress despite the crypto bounce. Conclusion: Maintain a defensive posture. A sustained VIX decline could trigger a transition toward Neutral, but cautious accumulation is not yet warranted until global liquidity stabilizes further.

reports.ID: GMS berada di 39, menunjukkan rezim Defensif. Momentum mendorong skor dari 37 ke 39. Akar: DXY (kekuatan Dolar) melemah dan VIX (volatilitas/ketakutan) turun 7%, meredakan kepanikan pasar. Peringatan: Namun, pelebaran HY Spread (risiko kredit) menandakan adanya tekanan korporasi yang tersembunyi di balik kenaikan aset berisiko. Kesimpulan: Tetap dalam posisi defensif. Penurunan VIX yang berkelanjutan dapat memicu transisi ke Netral, tetapi akumulasi belum disarankan hingga indikator likuiditas menunjukkan stabilitas yang lebih nyata.

reports.FR: Le GMS est Ã  39, indiquant un rÃ©gime DÃ©fensif. L'Ã©lan a poussÃ© le score de 37 Ã  39. Racine : Le DXY (force du dollar) a lÃ©gÃ¨rement flÃ©chi et le VIX (volatilitÃ©/peur) a chutÃ© de 7 %, apaisant les craintes immÃ©diates. Risque : L'Ã©largissement des spreads HY (risque de crÃ©dit) signale des tensions persistantes sur les entreprises. Conclusion : Maintenir une posture dÃ©fensive.
